modShortDescription: This mod increases the drop rate on zombie loot bags: 5% for normal, 10% for feral, and 20% for irradiated.
modDescription:
This mod increases the drop rate on [zombie](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-zombies/) loot bags: 5% for normal, 10% for feral, and 20% for irradiated.

**Hint:** Works well with [Longer Loot Bags](https://7daystodiemods.com/longer-loot-bags/) for those long horde nights.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/Donovan522/donovan-7d2d-modlets/tree/stable/donovan-morelootbags)**

If you find any issues or have a suggestion for improvement, please [open an issue](https://github.com/Donovan522/donovan-7d2d-modlets/issues) and Donovan will look into it ASAP.

**Credits:** [Donovan](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/donovan/)
